March 2025 – Our candidates for the Lancashire County elections have now been selected and we are encouraging all members and supporters to help with their campaigns. Help us make a change in Lancashire, and remove the decades of failing Lib Lab Con councillors.

Who We are
Welcome to the official website of Reform UK Hyndburn. We are a dynamic, forward-thinking local branch of Reform UK, committed to driving positive change for our community. Our mission is to represent the voices of the people of Hyndburn, advocating for common-sense policies that put local residents first.
We believe in fairness, transparency, and accountability in government. Our focus is on tackling the real issues that matter to you—improving public services, supporting local businesses, promoting economic growth, and ensuring that your hard-earned money is spent wisely.
At Reform UK Hyndburn, we’re not tied down by outdated political ideologies. Instead, we champion practical solutions, listening to the concerns of local people and working together to create a brighter future for our towns and villages.
In October 2024, Terry Waterhouse, our Chairman and former Senior Civil Servant became spokesperson for Reform UK Hyndburn. Since then, we’ve seen significant growth, with the formation of a dedicated branch team as the party continues to strive for greater professionalism and impact in our community.
Join us in standing up for change. Together, we can reform politics and make Hyndburn a better place to live, work, and thrive.
Our Branch Team
Welcome to our branch! Here, you’ll find a dedicated team committed to changing politics for good. Each member of our team brings unique skills and unwavering passion to ensure we make a real difference in our community and beyond.
We are proud to be staunch Reformers, driven by a shared belief in restoring our much-beloved country to its true greatness. With integrity, determination, and a clear vision for the future, our team is working tirelessly to create lasting, positive change. Get to know the faces behind our branch’s mission—we’re here to inspire, lead, and make an impact together!
